definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Mistreatment by the colonial rulers and collection of a new poll tax increased tensions.
sentences.chinese: 殖民統治的虐待和新的人頭稅增加了緊張的氣氛。

sentences.english: No Capitation, or other direct, Tax shall be laid.
sentences.chinese: 不得徵收人頭稅或其它直接稅。

sentences.english: The demonstration itself was against the Government's new Community Charge.
sentences.chinese: 遊行本身反對的是政府新出臺的“人頭稅”。

sentences.english: In 1885 the Canadian government passed the first anti-chinese bill known as The Head Tax.
sentences.chinese: 1885年加拿大政府通過反華的人頭稅法案。
